divine_sanctum.name: Divine Sanctum
divine_sanctum.description: Your divine seat of power. The heart of your territory, forever under your control.

mine_copper_1.name: Copper Vein
mine_copper_1.description: A rich copper deposit guarded by stone elementals. Perfect for beginning miners.

forest_grove_1.name: Verdant Grove
forest_grove_1.description: An ancient forest teeming with magical plants and protective spirits.

coast_bay_1.name: Pearl Bay
coast_bay_1.description: A pristine coastal bay where pearls form in the crystal-clear waters.

hunting_plains_1.name: Wild Plains
hunting_plains_1.description: Vast plains roamed by mighty beasts. A hunter's paradise and a test of skill.

ancient_forge_1.name: Ember Forge
ancient_forge_1.description: An ancient forge where flames never die. The perfect place to craft weapons and armor.

shrine_light_1.name: Dawn Shrine
shrine_light_1.description: A sacred temple bathed in eternal light, resonating with divine power.

iron_mine_2.name: Iron Depths
iron_mine_2.description: A deep mine rich with iron ore, extending far beneath the earth.

mythril_mine_2.name: Mythril Vein
mythril_mine_2.description: A rare mythril deposit guarded by powerful earth elementals. Requires skilled miners.

ancient_forest_2.name: Elderwood Forest
ancient_forest_2.description: An ancient woodland where rare herbs and magical plants flourish under the protection of elder treants.

shallow_coast_2.name: Coral Shallows
shallow_coast_2.description: Shallow waters teeming with fish and vibrant coral reefs rich with pearls.

deep_harbor_2.name: Deepwater Harbor
deep_harbor_2.description: A deep harbor where the ocean's treasures lie hidden in treacherous waters guarded by sea titans.

beast_den_2.name: Feral Wilds
beast_den_2.description: Wild lands where ferocious predators roam. Only the bravest hunters venture here.

monster_lair_2.name: Wyvern's Roost
monster_lair_2.description: A dangerous lair inhabited by mythical beasts. Monster parts from here are highly prized by crafters.

runestone_circle_2.name: Runestone Circle
runestone_circle_2.description: Ancient runestones arranged in a mystical circle, humming with arcane power.

sacred_altar_2.name: Altar of the Ancients
sacred_altar_2.description: A sacred altar where the ancients once performed rituals of awakening. Divine power flows freely here.

steel_forge_2.name: Steelworks
steel_forge_2.description: A well-equipped forge specializing in steel production. The sound of hammers rings day and night.

master_forge_2.name: Dragon's Forge
master_forge_2.description: A legendary forge heated by dragonfire. Master craftsmen can create exceptional equipment here.

ancient_library_2.name: Archives of Knowledge
ancient_library_2.description: A library containing valuable knowledge and scrolls. Scholars come here to research and learn.

adamantite_mine_3.name: Adamantite Depths
adamantite_mine_3.description: A legendary mine containing rare adamantite ore. Only master miners can extract its treasures.

mithril_quarry_3.name: Silver Quarry
mithril_quarry_3.description: A vast quarry rich in mythril and gemstones, shimmering under the moonlight.

enchanted_grove_3.name: Enchanted Heartwood
enchanted_grove_3.description: The heart of an ancient enchanted forest where magical plants thrive under the protection of elder spirits.

primeval_woods_3.name: Primeval Woods
primeval_woods_3.description: Ancient woods untouched by time, filled with valuable lumber and rare medicinal herbs.

crystal_cavern_3.name: Crystal Caverns
crystal_cavern_3.description: Magnificent caverns filled with luminous crystals and rare gemstones. A jeweler's dream.

abyssal_trench_3.name: Abyssal Trench
abyssal_trench_3.description: The darkest depths of the ocean where legendary sea monsters guard priceless treasures.

tropical_lagoon_3.name: Azure Lagoon
tropical_lagoon_3.description: A tropical paradise with crystal-clear waters abundant in fish and precious pearls.

dragon_nest_3.name: Dragon's Lair
dragon_nest_3.description: A legendary dragon's lair filled with unimaginable treasures and deadly guardians.

savage_highlands_3.name: Savage Highlands
savage_highlands_3.description: Brutal highlands where fierce predators hunt. A test of skill for any hunter.

titan_fortress_3.name: Titan's Bastion
titan_fortress_3.description: An impregnable fortress built by titans. Controlling it grants immense defensive advantages.

war_camp_3.name: Warband Encampment
war_camp_3.description: A military encampment where warriors train and prepare for battle.

grand_temple_3.name: Celestial Sanctum
grand_temple_3.description: A grand temple where the divine presence is strongest. Rituals performed here hold exceptional power.

spirit_shrine_3.name: Shrine of Spirits
spirit_shrine_3.description: A sacred shrine where spirits of the ancestors dwell, offering blessings to the worthy.

volcanic_forge_3.name: Inferno Forge
volcanic_forge_3.description: A forge built within a volcano, capable of creating legendary equipment with the power of molten earth.

master_workshop_3.name: Master's Workshop
master_workshop_3.description: A workshop where master craftsmen perfect their art, producing superior equipment.

great_library_3.name: Great Library of Ages
great_library_3.description: A vast repository of ancient knowledge and forbidden secrets. Scholars seek its wisdom for ages.

scholar_academy_3.name: Academy of Scholars
scholar_academy_3.description: An academy where scholars gather to research, teach, and preserve knowledge for future generations.

arcane_observatory_3.name: Celestial Observatory
arcane_observatory_3.description: An observatory where scholars study the stars and uncover cosmic secrets through celestial research.

border_outpost_3.name: Frontier Outpost
border_outpost_3.description: A frontier outpost guarding the borders. Strategic position provides defensive advantages.

divine_ore_mine_4.name: Divine Ore Excavation
divine_ore_mine_4.description: A legendary excavation site where divine ore is found. Only the most skilled gatherer specialists can work here.

enchanted_crystal_mine_4.name: Enchanted Crystal Mines
enchanted_crystal_mine_4.description: Mines filled with enchanted crystals that pulse with magical energy.

moonlit_forest_4.name: Moonlit Glade
moonlit_forest_4.description: A mystical forest bathed in eternal moonlight where the rarest herbs grow.

mystic_woodland_4.name: Mystic Timberlands
mystic_woodland_4.description: Timberlands imbued with ancient magic, home to the rarest woods and herbs.

leviathan_depths_4.name: Leviathan's Domain
leviathan_depths_4.description: The deepest ocean trenches where leviathans rule. Only master fishers dare venture here.

coral_kingdom_4.name: Coral Kingdom
coral_kingdom_4.description: A vast underwater kingdom built entirely of living coral and precious pearls.

primordial_hunting_grounds_4.name: Primordial Hunting Grounds
primordial_hunting_grounds_4.description: Ancient hunting grounds where primordial beasts roam. The ultimate test for monster hunters.

beast_sanctuary_4.name: Sacred Beast Sanctuary
beast_sanctuary_4.description: A sacred sanctuary where legendary beasts are protected by ancient wardens.

imperial_citadel_4.name: Imperial Citadel
imperial_citadel_4.description: The ultimate fortress - an imperial citadel commanding immense military power.

military_stronghold_4.name: Iron Stronghold
military_stronghold_4.description: A heavily fortified stronghold built from iron and stone, nearly impregnable.

supreme_temple_4.name: Supreme Temple of Ascension
supreme_temple_4.description: The supreme temple where gods themselves are said to ascend. Divine power flows like rivers here.

oracle_shrine_4.name: Oracle's Sanctum
oracle_shrine_4.description: A sacred sanctum where oracles commune with the divine and foresee the future.

legendary_forge_4.name: Forge of Legends
legendary_forge_4.description: The legendary forge where mythic equipment is born. Only master crafters can harness its power.

titan_forge_4.name: Titan's Anvil
titan_forge_4.description: A massive forge built by titans, capable of creating equipment of exceptional power.

grand_academy_4.name: Grand Academy of Arcana
grand_academy_4.description: The grand academy where the greatest scholars unlock the deepest secrets of magic and knowledge.

ancient_archives_4.name: Ancient Archives
ancient_archives_4.description: Archives containing knowledge from forgotten ages, guarded by powerful sentinels.

obsidian_mine_4.name: Obsidian Depths
obsidian_mine_4.description: Dark mines filled with obsidian and rare ores, shrouded in shadow and mystery.

wildfire_forest_4.name: Wildfire Glade
wildfire_forest_4.description: A forest ablaze with eternal fire, where fire-resistant plants produce unique materials.

tidal_depths_4.name: Tidal Abyss
tidal_depths_4.description: The deepest tidal zones where massive sea creatures and rare pearls abound.

beast_king_domain_4.name: Beast King's Domain
beast_king_domain_4.description: Domain ruled by the Beast King, where only the strongest creatures survive.

war_citadel_4.name: Citadel of War
war_citadel_4.description: A mighty citadel built for war, housing elite legions and powerful siege weapons.

divine_sanctum_4.name: Divine Sanctum of Light
divine_sanctum_4.description: A sanctum radiating divine light, where awakening rituals reach their peak potential.

worldforge_4.name: World Forge
worldforge_4.description: A forge said to have been used to craft worlds. Its flames burn with cosmic power.

hall_of_eternity_4.name: Hall of Eternity
hall_of_eternity_4.description: A hall where time stands still, preserving knowledge from across all of eternity.

celestial_ore_mine_5.name: Celestial Ore Pinnacle
celestial_ore_mine_5.description: The legendary pinnacle where celestial ore falls from the heavens. Only master specialists can mine it.

world_tree_grove_5.name: World Tree Grove
world_tree_grove_5.description: The sacred grove of the World Tree, source of all life and nature's greatest treasures.

infinite_ocean_5.name: Edge of the Infinite Ocean
infinite_ocean_5.description: The edge of the world where the infinite ocean meets eternity. Legendary sea creatures guard priceless treasures.

apex_hunting_realm_5.name: Apex Predator Realm
apex_hunting_realm_5.description: The hunting realm where only apex predators survive. The ultimate test for legendary hunters.

eternal_fortress_5.name: Eternal Fortress
eternal_fortress_5.description: The eternal fortress that has never fallen. Controlling it grants supreme military power.

godforge_5.name: The Godforge
godforge_5.description: The legendary Godforge where divine artifacts are created. Only the gods themselves know its secrets.

omniscient_library_5.name: Library of Omniscience
omniscient_library_5.description: The ultimate library containing all knowledge past, present, and future. Its secrets are beyond mortal comprehension.

divine_throne_temple_5.name: Temple of the Divine Throne
divine_throne_temple_5.description: The throne where gods sit. Controlling it grants divine authority beyond mortal imagination.

olympus_outpost_5.name: Olympus Outpost
olympus_outpost_5.description: An outpost of Mount Olympus itself. The gods watch over this stronghold.

valhalla_gateway_5.name: Gateway to Valhalla
valhalla_gateway_5.description: The gateway to Valhalla where the greatest warriors are chosen. Glory awaits those who control it.

asgard_forge_5.name: Forge of Asgard
asgard_forge_5.description: The legendary forge of Asgard where Mjolnir itself was crafted. Divine weapons are born here.

atlantis_depths_5.name: Lost Depths of Atlantis
atlantis_depths_5.description: The lost depths of Atlantis, sunken kingdom of legend. Untold treasures lie beneath the waves.

yggdrasil_roots_5.name: Roots of Yggdrasil
yggdrasil_roots_5.description: The sacred roots of Yggdrasil, the world tree of Norse legend. Nature's power flows strongest here.

mount_olympus_mine_5.name: Olympus Quarry
mount_olympus_mine_5.description: The legendary quarry of Mount Olympus where gods mined materials for their divine weapons.

akashic_records_5.name: Akashic Records
akashic_records_5.description: The Akashic Records - the cosmic library containing the history of all souls and all knowledge.

nirvana_temple_5.name: Temple of Nirvana
nirvana_temple_5.description: The sacred temple of Nirvana where enlightenment and divine ascension are achieved.

realm_gate_5.name: Interdimensional Realm Gate
realm_gate_5.description: A gate connecting all dimensions and realities. Knowledge from infinite worlds flows through here.
